name: Basic
description: Start your fitness journey with our Basic plan. This plan is designed for beginners who want to establish a solid foundation for their health and wellness. With access to a variety of basic workouts, you'll be able to kickstart your fitness routine and track your progress every step of the way.

name: Pro
description: Elevate your fitness game with our Pro plan. Whether you're a seasoned fitness enthusiast or looking to take your workouts to the next level, the Pro plan has you covered. Enjoy access to a wide range of workouts, personalized nutrition tips, and expert guidance from our fitness trainers.
features: Access to Basic and Pro Workouts

name: Premium
description: Experience the pinnacle of fitness with our Premium plan. This comprehensive package provides you with everything you need to achieve your fitness goals. Enjoy unlimited access to all workout programs, personalized meal plans, direct support from certified trainers, and exclusive access to premium fitness content.
features: Access to Basic, Pro, and Premium Workouts
